about.details:
PlatinumOne Business Services Limited provides customer acquisition-specific Business Process Management Services (BPMS) services to mid-size and large corporates. The company offers its services in several industries including FMCG, Real Estate, Furniture, Insurance, Consumer Durables, etc. Process offerings include Lead Conversion, Customer Care, Channel Management, Lead Generation and Loyalty Program which are delivered through their Call Centres.

The company has a registered office in Maharashtra and has branches in Delhi & Kolkata as well. Clients include the likes of Godrej Properties, Godrej Interio, Edelweiss Tokio Life, Tally, Lodha Group, Hafele, Reliance Nippon, Capital foods.

Competitive strengths

  • Strict adherence to quality standards.
  • Focus on quality service.
  • Experienced Management Team.
  • Innovative process solutions.
  • Skilled IT team, Excellent Infrastructure, and highest quality of Technology.
  • Safe & friendly working environment for employees.

faqs.question: What is the Platinumone Business Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Platinumone Business Services IPO is a SME IPO of 422400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.89 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹92 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 2, 2021, and closes on September 7, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Platinumone Business Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Platinumone Business Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Platinumone Business Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Platinumone Business Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Platinumone Business Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Platinumone Business Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Platinumone Business Services IPO opens on September 2, 2021 and closes on September 7, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Platinumone Business Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Platinumone Business Services IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Platinumone Business Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Platinumone Business Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Platinumone Business Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Platinumone Business Services IPO will be done on Monday, September 13, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 15, 2021. Check the Platinumone Business Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Platinumone Business Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Platinumone Business Services IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 16, 2021.
